subject: Re: Posted a Couple from the New RS Hack box
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Listening to your files, it doesn't sound too much different than the 
other RS Hack models to me.  The manipulation is nice and distinctly 
different than just radio station bands coming through.  You can tell a 
difference.  Thanks for the find.  Our collection grows...

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> 
> This radio seems a bit weird sounding, reminds me a lot of a joe's 
> box.  You seem to get messages in the static in between stations 
too.  
> The files are also kinda rough and up for some interpretation.
> 
> -Steve H.
>
